bs-checklist-tag-checklist-desc: Generates a checkbox or a select menu. The checklist can be modified by various parameters.
bs-checklist-dlg-items-hint: In order to add a new item, type in the field above and hit <kbd>Enter</kbd>.
bs-checklist-confirm-dirty-text: You made modifications to the checklist that are not yet saved. Are you sure you want to discard the changes?
log-description-bs-checklist: Log of changes on checkboxes on pages.
logentry-bs-checklist-selected: $1 {{GENDER:$2|has selected}} the value "$5" in select box #$4 on page $3
apihelp-bs-checklist-available-options-s: Lists all available options for checklist templates. Allows sorting, filtering and pagination. Implements ExtJS Store parameters.
Lists all available options for checklist templates. Allows sorting, filtering and pagination. Implements ExtJS Store parameters.
apihelp-bs-checklist-template-store-desc: Lists all templates that are valid checklist sources. Allows sorting, filtering and pagination. Implements ExtJS Store parameters.
apihelp-bs-checklist-template-store-summ: Lists all templates that are valid checklist sources. Allows sorting, filtering and pagination. Implements ExtJS Store parameters.
